alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Western Addison; Western Chittenden (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 11:48AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Addison and southwestern Chittenden Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1147 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicates multiple thunderstorms tracking across Middlebury, Weybridge, Ferrisburg, and Monkton, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Multiple rounds of heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain may result in ponding on roadways. Locations impacted include... Middlebury, Vergennes, Ferrisburg, Charlotte, Weybridge, Waltham, Bristol, Monkton Ridge, Monkton, Monkton Boro, New Haven, Ferrisburgh, Mt. Philo State Park, Starksboro, Hinesburg, Huntington, Bridport, Cornwall, Panton and Addison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Western Addison; Western Chittenden
